meanings.definition: Of or relating to the killing or controlling of nematodes.
meanings.sent1: The nematocidal spray effectively eliminated the harmful worms in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use nematocidal products to protect their crops from nematode infestations.
meanings.sent3: The nematocidal treatment turned the soil into a nematode-free paradise.
meanings.sent4: Her nematocidal approach to gardening ensured a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the nematocidal solution made it easy to spot in the field.

meanings.definition: A substance or agent that kills or controls nematodes.
meanings.sent1: The farmer applied a nematocidal to the soil to protect the plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching new nematocidals to combat nematode damage.
meanings.sent3: The nematocidal in the spray was so effective that the nematodes didn't stand a chance.
meanings.sent4: The nematocidal worked like magic, saving the crops from destruction.
meanings.sent5: The nematocidal's impact on nematode populations was remarkable.
